name: Overdue
description:
Overdue is a 2D Stealth Platformer which incorporates the use of light and shadows to evade enemies. Players would be tasked with returning an overdue library book, whilst traversing through a plethora of security guards and escaping unseen. 

Being exposed to the overheads lights may result in your capture, precision and speed is key to make it out successfully.

- Created by Mitchell Whinnen and Gareth Yeap
